snippet: When it comes to dealing with the country’s economic problems, Americans give President Obama the upper hand, according to a national poll released Friday.
abstract: When it comes to dealing with the country’s economic problems, Americans give President Obama the upper hand, according to a national poll released Friday.
lead_paragraph: When it comes to dealing with the country’s economic problems, Americans give President Obama the upper hand, according to a national poll released Friday. Nearly half, 48 percent, said they trust Mr. Obama more to develop solutions to the nation’s economic problems, compared with the 32 percent who trust Congressional Republicans more.
